title: Citi Receives Secretaría Distrital de la Mujer Award
summary: Bogotá - Once again, Citi Colombia has been honored for its commitment to gender equality, this time by the Secretaría Distrital de la Mujer (District Women's Secretariat). The award recognizes the bank as a company that values equality and works to create inclusive programs that incentivize employee progress.
tag-1: Citi Receives Secretaría Distrital de la Mujer Award
tag-3: Bogotá – Once again, Citi Colombia has been honored for its commitment to gender equality, this time by the Secretaría Distrital de la Mujer (District Women's Secretariat). The award recognizes the bank as a company that values equality and works to create inclusive programs that incentivize employee progress.
tag-4: Citi has policies and best practices for gender equity, including a leadership committee of 14 women who support gender-oriented development projects; an Accelerated Talent Development program for women; and activities that promote the adoption of a culture of gender equality, including Diversity Week.
tag-5: In addition, 60 percent of the bank's workforce is made up of women, and 84 percent of hiring processes at the vice-presidential level include at least one woman finalist in an effort to promote diversity at the executive level.
tag-6: "Citi promotes inclusive development among its employees through initiatives designed to improve women's quality of life by providing incentives for professional development and the tools they need to ensure there are no limits on their growth within the bank," said Lucia Ojeda, Vice President for Human Resources at Citi Colombia.
tag-7: Citi has received a number of recognitions for best practices in support of workplace equality, including first place for two consecutive years in Aequales, CESA and Secretaría Distrital de la Mujer's ranking of "Gender Equality among Organizations." And in 2016, Colombia's House of Representatives awarded Citi the Simón Bolívar Order of Democracy for "its policy of real and effective gender equality."
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
